Articles.Content:
What I really want to see, aside from FAR being implemented, is the ability to modify parts.

That is:

-Modify the size (maybe by inputting a length/height value or clicking & dragging?)

-Modify shape??

-Modify amount of contents (fuel/oxidizer/etc)

-Modify colors of parts

-Modify strength/durability of parts (Improving crash/heat/g-force/etc tolerance)

-etcetra.

And all will have an effect on the mass and how aerodynamic it is.
So basically dynamic procedural part manipulation... Eh. Useful, in some ways. Possibly a pain in the neck in other ways, though. Not exactly a new idea; Maxis made Spore a long time ago now.
Huh. Interesting... Have you seen Stretchy Tanks? I may be mistaken, but I believe that it does some of the things you're talking about.
